name: Sail On! Sail On! Hommus Eating Comp
name_original: Sail On! Sail On! Hommus Eating Comp
description:
Sail On! Sail On! inspired 2 hour Game Jam

Controls

Best played with a  friend

Left Shift to make Skinny eat

Spacebar to make Ethan eat

The person to eat the most hummus wins :)

Song Credits
